content: I am a biostatistican and a data scientist pursuing a PhD in biostatistics at the University of Pennsylvania as a part of the Penn Statistical Imaging and Visualization Endeavor ( PennSIVE) Center. My research interests include statistical and computational methods for the analysis of neuroimaging data and clinical trials.
summary: I am a biostatistican and a data scientist pursuing a PhD in biostatistics at the University of Pennsylvania as a part of the Penn Statistical Imaging and Visualization Endeavor ( PennSIVE) Center.
title: Carolyn Lou
